page.title: 12COMMUNICATION C. CROOKHAM
page.content: { Post Office}(Crookham Camp) Corner of{Reading Road South}& {Compton}Road. Daily use 600 people. Collection = 4,9am, 12pm, 4pm, 5:15pm. {Post Boxes}= 12. Average letters collected weekly =2000 Average parcels collected weekly = 400 {Workers}in post office = 12,5 postmen, 4 postwomen, 3 office workers. {Bus Survey.}London x9 to Aldershot runs Monday to Friday with a frequency 3 times a day in each direction. { Reading to Aldershot}also runs Monday to Friday with a frequency of 60 minutes pm. Buses on a circular route run through{Fleet}town. 413)4)5)6 run on Tuesday, Thursday and Friday. They have a frequency of every 60 minutes am only. Traffic survey (Crookham Cross Rd 11.10-11.25.) June. cars 543 lorries 121 buses 1 army 4 m.bikes 14 bikes 12.most traffic came from the N.
